daily.text: For every disadvantage there is a corresponding advantage.
daily.author: Clement Stone

daily.text: Training is an active, dynamic process lived out daily in all areas of life- not a rote exercise in memorizing verses and going to church every week.
daily.author: Craig Groeschel

daily.text: Sometimes the best helping hand you can get is a good, firm push.
daily.author: Joann Thomas

daily.text: If your daily life seems poor, do not blame it; blame yourself that you are not poet enough to call forth its riches; for the Creator, there is no poverty.
daily.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

daily.text: Within you lies your strength.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: The Civil Rights Act of 1964 laid the foundation for the Voting Rights Act of 1965, but it also addressed nearly every other aspect of daily life in a would-be free democratic society.
daily.author: Aberjhani

daily.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: I see any difficulty as an adventure.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: The illusion of purpose and design is perhaps the most pervasive illusion about nature that science has to confront on a daily basis.
daily.author: Lawrence M. Krauss

daily.text: Teaching does allow me to keep one foot in the youthful waters I tend to occupy in my novels, so I'm thankful for that. My students also remind me on a daily basis that the stories I collected during my district attorney days are actually interesting to people who haven't had that experience.
daily.author: Alafair Burke

daily.text: I found that dance, music, and literature is how I made sense of the world... It pushed me to think of things bigger than life's daily routines... To think beyond what is immediate or convenient.
daily.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

daily.text: Our investigation has found that, unlike traditional fantasy sports, daily fantasy sports companies are engaged in illegal gambling under New York law, causing the same kinds of social and economic harms as other forms of illegal gambling and misleading New York consumers.
daily.author: Eric Schneiderman

daily.text: In the morning, I use a Philosophy cleanser and Olay Regenerist Daily 3 Point Treatment Cream, which sinks in well and feels firming. I rarely wear foundation, so cotton wool soaked in warm water is often enough to cleanse at night, but I take off eye make-up with Klorane's cornflower-infused remover.
daily.author: Saffron Aldridge

daily.text: Nurture your Dream everyday. A strong dream will empower you to take bold decisions and allow you to follow your heart.
daily.author: Manoj Arora

daily.text: Don't get me wrong, I love watching episodes of my favorite shows on Hulu and reading the daily trash on PageSix, but I also embrace the opportunity to settle down with a good book and let my mind travel to another place and time.
daily.author: Rachel Nichols

daily.text: It used to upset me - now it makes me sad - to see people use patriotism and our troops as a pawn in their political argument. Because I know personally, growing up in a military family, the sacrifice that is made on a daily basis.
daily.author: Tamron Hall

daily.text: Daily irradiation of the human body by natural sunlight is an extremely important aspect of human health.
daily.author: Steven Magee

daily.text: Writing became an obsessive compulsive habit but I had almost no money so I thought about being an urban firefighter and having lots of free time in which to write or becoming an English teacher and thinking about books and writers on a daily basis. That swayed me.
daily.author: David Guterson

daily.text: By fundamentally changing how we design the places and systems that enable our daily lives, we can slash emissions way beyond the immediate carbon savings - because our own personal emissions are just the tip of a vast iceberg of energy and resources consumed far from our view.
daily.author: Alex Steffen

daily.text: People, I guess, generally come to see me do stand-up with a working knowledge of my broad sense of humor on 'The Daily Show'... I don't think anyone would mistake me as an actual anchor.
daily.author: John Oliver

daily.text: You have to do something about your dream every day.
daily.author: Sunday Adelaja

daily.text: Many losses have gone sinking daily by our inability to recognize the great deal of power reserved in us. Watch out and make it real because soon, it's going to be your turn to shine!
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: The wisdom of God's Word is quite clear on believers being unequally yoked. And marrying someone who is not a Christian - who is not a daily disciple of Christ - is being unequally yoked, regardless of what their beliefs might be.
daily.author: Pat Robertson

daily.text: Be grateful for the day and the day will be grateful for you. Stay positive and everything around you will respond in kind.
daily.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

daily.text: The more natural or eco-based products you can introduce into your beauty regimen, the more beneficial it is for your skin. It's similar to introducing organic food into your daily diet.
daily.author: Ivanka Trump

daily.text: God meets daily needs daily. Not weekly or annually. He will give you what you need when it is needed.
daily.author: Max Lucado

daily.text: Failure is a sign post, directing the right road for life’s journey.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Until you prove what is in you, what is in you shall always be what is in you.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

wanderlust.text: Drifting across the vast space, silent except for wind and footsteps, I felt uncluttered and unhurried for the first time in a while, already on desert time.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: You have to keep doing it, Even if no one is watching. The best artists, are those Who live from their expressions, Not chasing the impressions.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: For many years, I have been moved by the blue at the far edge of what can be seen, that color of horizons, of remote mountain ranges, of anything far away. The color of that distance is the color of an emotion, the color of solitude and of desire, the color of there seen from here, the color of where you are not. And the color of where you can never go. For the blue is not in the place those miles away at the horizon, but in the atmospheric distance between you and the mountains.“Longing,” says the poet Robert Hass, “because desire is full of endless distances.” Blue is the color of longing for the distances you never arrive in, for the blue world.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: The desire to go home that is a desire to be whole, to know where you are, to be the point of intersection of all the lines drawn through all the stars, to be the constellation-maker and the center of the world, that center called love. To awaken from sleep, to rest from awakening, to tame the animal, to let the soul go wild, to shelter in darkness and blaze with light, to cease to speak and be perfectly understood.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

wanderlust.text: I am running and singing and when it’s raining I’m the only one left on the open street, smiling with my eyes fixed on the sky because it’s cleaning me. I’m the one on the other side of the party, hearing laughter and the emptying of bottles while I peacefully make my way to the river, a lonely road, following the smell of the ocean. I’m the one waking up at 4am to witness the sunrise, where the sky touches the sea, and I hold my elbows, grasping tight to whatever I’ve made of myself.
wanderlust.author: Charlotte Eriksson

wanderlust.text: Delay and dirt are the realities of the most rewarding travel.
wanderlust.author: Paul Theroux

wanderlust.text: It might be well enough to wander if you've a place and people to come back to, but I tell you now there's no desolation like wanting to go home and truly not knowing where it is.
wanderlust.author: Elizabeth Kerner

wanderlust.text: Will I ever get over the pull I feel to both of these places?
wanderlust.author: Sara Ferguson

wanderlust.text: ..Luxury is the enemy of observation, a costly indulgence that induces such a good feeling that you notice nothing. Luxury spoils and infantilizes you and prevents you from knowing the world. That is its purpose, the reason why luxury cruises and great hotels are full of fatheads who, when they express an opinion, seem as though they are from another planet. It was also my experience that one of the worst aspects of travelling with wealthy people, apart from the fact that the rich never listen, is that they constantly groused about the high cost of living – indeed, the rich usually complained of being poor.
wanderlust.author: Paul Theroux

wanderlust.text: All night, after the exhausting games of canasta, we would look over the immense sea, full of white-flecked and green reflections, the two of us leaning side by side on the railing, each of us far away, flying in his own aircraft to the stratospheric regions of his own dreams. There we understood that our vocation, our true vocation, was to move for eternity along the roads and seas of the world. Always curious, looking into everything that came before our eyes, sniffing out each corner but only ever faintly--not setting down roots in any land or staying long enough to see the substratum of things the outer limits would suffice.
wanderlust.author: Ernesto Che Guevara

wanderlust.text: One soft humid early spring morning driving a winding road across Mount Tamalpais, the 2,500-foot mountain just north of the Golden Gate Bridge, a bend reveals a sudden vision of San Francisco in shades of blue, a city in a dream, and I was filled with a tremendous yearning to live in that place of blue hills and blue buildings, though I do live there, I had just left there after breakfast.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: The geographical pilgrimage is the symbolic acting out an inner journey. The inner journey is the interpolation of the meanings and signs of the outer pilgrimage. One can have one without the other. It is best to have both.
wanderlust.author: Thomas Merton

wanderlust.text: I dont live in a fantasy; just a dream, that's to hard for some to believe.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: The depths of her thoughts will have you never wanting to surface for air...
wanderlust.author: Maquita Donyel Irvin

wanderlust.text: Alone in the car with my social life all before and behind me, I was suspended in the beautiful solitude of the open road, in a kind of introspection that only outdoor space generates, for inside and outside are more intertwined than the usual distinctions allow. The emotion stirred by the landscape is piercing, a joy close to pain when the blue is deepest on the horizon or the clouds are doing those spectacular fleeting things so much easier to recall than to describe.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: The beauty he saw in her was the beauty she forgot to see in herself and what a beautiful reminder, that love is what will see us all through.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: We are all pilgrims who seek Italy.
wanderlust.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wanderlust.text: Life's trials will test you, and shape you, but don’t let them change who you are.”~ Aaron Lauritsen, ‘100 Days Drive.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: If you didn't earn something, it's not worth flaunting.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.
wanderlust.author: Vladimir Nabokov

wanderlust.text: It was the inverse of an island in the sea.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: Everytime I share Jesus Christ, I feel like a superhero!
wanderlust.author: Jane Bulos

wanderlust.text: I'm sorry! I really am! I wanted to get out of this place! I want to live! I want to get away from here and never see it again! I hate everything about it!'You will hate the next place, too,' I said. 'What you are you will carry with you.
wanderlust.author: Louis L'Amour

wanderlust.text: I keep going backas if I'm looking for something I have lostback to the motherland, sisterland, fatherlandback to the beacon, the breastthe smell and taste of the breeze,and the singing of the rain.
wanderlust.author: Heather Nova

wanderlust.text: Explore, Experience, Then Push Beyond.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: Ô, the wine of a womanfrom heaven is sent, more perfect than allthat a man can invent.When she came to my bed and begged me with sighsnot to tempt her towards passion nor actions unwise, 	I told her I’d spare her and kissed her closed eyes, then unbraided her body of its clothing disguise.While our bodies were nude bathed in candlelight fineI devoured her mouth, tender lips divine;and I drank through her thighs her feminine wine.Ô, the wine of a woman from heaven is sent,more perfect than all that a man can invent.
wanderlust.author: Roman Payne

wanderlust.text: There’s something about arriving in new cities, wandering empty streets with no destination. I will never lose the love for the arriving, but I'm born to leave.
wanderlust.author: Charlotte Eriksson

wanderlust.text: I know it's not strictly sex that accounts for my straying the motive usually attributed to men. I think it's just too tempting to have two lives rather than one. Some people think that too much travel begets infidelity: Separation and opportunity test the bonds of love. I think it's more likely that people who hate to make choices to settle on one thing or another are attracted to travel. Travel doesn't beget a double life. The appeal of the double life begets travel.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: And if travel is like love, it is, in the end, mostly because it’s a heightened state of awareness, in which we are mindful, receptive, in dimmed by familiarity and ready to be transformed. That is why the best trips, like the best love affairs, never really end.
wanderlust.author: Pico Iyer

motivational.text: Persevere like a seed; even when people try to bury you, flourish.
motivational.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

motivational.text: The gift of the moments and its lessons prepares us for a better tomorrow.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: When you need motivation, look no where! Just say 'YES, I CAN DO IT.
motivational.author: Mohith Agadi

motivational.text: When a lion kills a deer it does not build negative KARMA, its meant that way!!!!
motivational.author: Harrish Sairaman

motivational.text: You are charming. Your charm, just like your ability to live happily and be successful is beyond a limit. Day after day, innumerable people all over the world are always in search of social acceptance and validation for their beauty.Stop looking for people’s validation of your beauty! Stop trying to make people accept you; stop trying to look for someone to tell you how charming your eyes are. Stop searching for someone to be grateful for your love and beautiful smile. Stop looking for someone to admire you for your strong mind when you are faced with troubles in life.Don’t give people’s validation more power than it has earned. The can only give you a reflection of your connection with gravity. That’s it. Your purpose in life cannot be measured by a scale, the reason for your existence, your beauty; talent cannot be measured by this scale. Why don’t you just take the note of the number and then live your life freely? Because life is beautiful. You are Beautiful!
motivational.author: Ane Krstevska

motivational.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
motivational.author: Auliq-Ice

motivational.text: To become a better you, remember to be grateful to people who have contributed to making you who you are today.
motivational.author: Israelmore Ayivor

motivational.text: It is not necessary to be large to be a perfectly good arthropod (or mollusc, come to that).
motivational.author: Richard Fortey

motivational.text: The beauty of today may not be realised until it becomes tomorrow’s memory.
motivational.author: Steven Aitchison

motivational.text: If you listen to critics for too long, you will become deaf to success.
motivational.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

motivational.text: Be like stars; instead of cursing the darkness, shine.
motivational.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

motivational.text: Data has no ego and makes an excellent co-pilot.
motivational.author: Jay Samit

motivational.text: Be what, you wishes to be.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: You will need to know when to be assertive and wise enough to know when to exercise patience.
motivational.author: Julian Pencilliah

motivational.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: There is no greater crime against humanity than usury.
motivational.author: Compton Gage

motivational.text: With every step we take we have a choice to make. Our choices determine our actions. Our actions determine who we are.
motivational.author: Randall Marr

motivational.text: Take all of your wasted honorEvery little past frustrationTake all of your so-called problems,Better put 'em in quotations.
motivational.author: John Mayer

motivational.text: Success sits on a mountain of mistakes.
motivational.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

motivational.text: You never know what people have endured to get where they are.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: Then holding the star aloft and the bright sword advanced, Frodo, hobbit of the Shire, walked steadily down to meet the eyes.
motivational.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

motivational.text: Your money is just a condition to get my business, your professionalism is the price.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

motivational.text: Holding on, holding out and holding fast when the going is tough constitutes a winning mindset.
motivational.author: Ogwo David Emenike

motivational.text: Don't fight to be right, but fight when you are right.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

love.text: But I have made a study of Shadowhunters now, over the past century, and let me tell you that we are more human than most human beings. When our hearts break, they break into shards that cannot be easily fit back together. I envy mundanes their resilience sometimes.
love.author: Cassandra Clare

love.text: All children are love children, he said, but only the best ones are ever called that.
love.author: Paul Auster

love.text: Often-times, grass was more useful than gold. Man was more desirable than a beast. Chance was more seductive than knowledge, and eternal life was completely meaningless without love.
love.author: Amy Harmon

love.text: Plainly it isn't an exact science, despite it being a complex interaction of micro-decisions and corresponding thought; perhaps it doesn't always work and we pass by some potential soulmates like the proverbial ships in the night, never quite connecting. Then again, perhaps the system is tenacious and continues to run like a computer program on infinite loop, so that if at first you don't meet, you are drawn back together for another try.
love.author: Simon Pegg

love.text: I laughed as we turned in a tight circle... 'Tonight you're all mine.'Jake smiled but looked me dead in the eye. 'No. From now on.'My heart skipped. 'What?'Yours,' he said simply, 'from now on.
love.author: Kieran Scott

love.text: It is well to believe that there needs but a little more thought, a little more courage, more love, more devotion to life, a little more eagerness, one day to fling open wide the portals of joy and of truth.
love.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

love.text: There's no beauty without some sadness or damage, or at least the potential of damage. If something's unbreakable, you can't love it because it doesn't need your love. It's the thing that don't last that really move us.
love.author: Rory Dunlop

love.text: The mind defines, decides, doubts and divides - only the heart truly binds.
love.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

love.text: A great giftwe can giveto ourselvesis a willingnessto love everyone,no matter what.This frees us completely from the toxicjustificationswe use to hate.
love.author: Scott Stabile

love.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
love.author: Ally Condie

love.text: We have to consciously study how to be tender with each other until it becomes a habit because what was native has been stolen from us, the love of Black women for each other.
love.author: Audre Lorde

love.text: In Christian terms, evangelization and humanization are not alternatives. Nor are the 'vertical dimension' of faith and the 'horizontal dimension' of love for one's neighbor and political change.
love.author: Jurgen Moltmann

love.text: Can we share my eyes so you can see what I see?Can we share my ears so you can hear what I hear?Can you perch on my shouldersso you can go where I go?Always in my heart, I don’t experience anything separate from you.This shared wonderment becomes doubled.This shared love becomes infinite.
love.author: Kamand Kojouri

love.text: Within Eros, there is (the) promise; within Love there is (the) Truth.
love.author: Noetis

love.text: They say that life is just a blank chain, and precious moments are the beads we hang off it to make it beautiful.
love.author: Holly Smale

love.text: I turn my head so that he doesn't see my smile and secretly curse him for making me feel special.
love.author: Kasie West

love.text: She had never looked as well. She had entered her room as just an impossibly lovely girl. The woman who emerged was a trifle thinner, a great deal wiser, an ocean sadder. This one understood the nature of pain, and beneath the glory of her features, there was character, and a sure knowledge of suffering.
love.author: William Goldman

love.text: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: Sometimes we are written down in books. Or, someone tells a story in which our name figures. And so we live on, through someone else’s voice…These are the indelible marks others make of us, like the watermarks of high tides, names carved into barks, or stamps branded onto belongings. For what else is history but the collected voices of others, who sing a chorus of what once was. It is not words but voices that are the inscriptions seared onto pages, into minds, of the fragments others glean, as we live our lives in passing.Flitting and fl eeting, we rub off as we move through, and in our wake is cast the dust of the stars that we become. And sometimes it is caught on the fingers of others, and they press that gold to their lips, where it glistens, an eternal testimony to the fact that they adored us: So we, those of us whoremember, we grow more golden as we age, as if cast into statues that commemorate the splendor of those who loved us, and those we were privilegedto love.
love.author: Samantha Bruce-Benjamin

love.text: Lust arrives as an angel disguised as love, but it's still lust, not love.
love.author: Scarlet Risque

love.text: I'm not going anywhere,' she told me that night. But until we are old ladies--a cypress age, a Sawtooth age--I will continue to link arms with her, in public, in private, in a panic of love.
love.author: Karen Russell

love.text: Michelle, since the first day I met you I knew you were the one for me. I knew that I would make you my wife. I love waking up to your beautiful face every morning and seeing you before I close my eyes each night. I love you with everything in me, and I promise to be the man that you need for the rest of our lifetime together. Would you do me the honor of being my wife?
love.author: Blaque Diamond

love.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
love.author: Ted Chiang

love.text: She was learning something important: how to live within the sound of her own slow breathing, how to love the view when her eyes were shut.
love.author: Gwendoline Riley

love.text: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.
love.author: Patience Johnson

love.text: I do concentrate to make my soul beautiful more than my Body just for the reason because one day my body will expire but my soul is imperishable.
love.author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari

love.text: It is painful those feelings of pain,but accept it with love to see the gain.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: They did not use the sonic stunners but the foray gun, the ancient weapon that fires a set of metal fragments in a burst. They shot to kill him. He was dying when I got to him, sprawled and twisted away from his skis that stuck up out of the snow, his chest half shot away. I took his head in my arms and spoke to him, but he never answered me; only in a way he answered my love for him, crying out through the silent wreck and tumult of his mind as consciousness lapsed, in the unspoken tongue, once, clearly, 'Arek!' Then no more. I held him, crouching there in the snow, while he died. They let me do that. Then they made me get up, and took me off one way and him another, I going to prison and he into the dark.
love.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

happiness.text: We are born into this precious human existence to achieve the uni cation of opposites and become enlightened, or liberated, from the illusion of separation.
happiness.author: Dashama Konah Gordon

happiness.text: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
happiness.author: Don Marquis

happiness.text: Christmas united us as holy beings. We experience love, joy and peace.
happiness.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

happiness.text: The trick when it comes to dealing with depression is being able to imagine yourself out of it. When you can picture a happier life, you will be determined to work at the things that prevent it from happening.
happiness.author: Keysha Jade

happiness.text: I’ve never paid any attention to time. Dancer says I’ve enjoyed a luxury most people never have. He hates clocks and watches and everything that has to do with time. He says people already have too many lost days and that most folks live in the past or the future but never the present, always saying stuff like “I’m unhappy because ‘X’ happened to me yesterday, or I’ll be happy again when ‘Y’ happens to me tomorrow.” He says time is the ultimate villain.
happiness.author: Karen Marie Moning

happiness.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
happiness.author: Ted Chiang

happiness.text: Love is the moonlight when the moon is your heart.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: We cannot really love anybody with whom we never laugh.
happiness.author: Agnes Repplier

happiness.text: Talk happiness. The world is sad enough without your woe. No path is wholly rough.
happiness.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

happiness.text: Seals:The Five Cosmic Seals are five occult Level 333, 666, 999, 1330 and 003 operating 400,000 minuet mystical degrees.
happiness.author: Compton Gage

happiness.text: Happy Mind, Happy Home.
happiness.author: Napa Kettle

happiness.text: I wanted to freeze this moment forever, the chimes, the slight splash of the water, the chink of the dogs’ leashes, laughter from the pool, the skritch of my mother’s dip-pen, the smell of the trees, the stillness. I wished I could shut it in a locket to wear around my neck. I wished a sleep would find us, at this absolute second, like sleep over the castle of sleeping beauty.
happiness.author: Janet Fitch

happiness.text: Your perspective changes relative to the frame through which you see things.
happiness.author: Mensah Oteh

happiness.text: It is painful those feelings of pain,but accept it with love to see the gain.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: There is no greater crime against humanity than usury.
happiness.author: Compton Gage

happiness.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: There is a cause/effect relationship between your investment in yourself and the future you have.
happiness.author: Mensah Oteh

happiness.text: But what was there to say?Only that there were tears. Only that Quietness and Emptiness fitted together like stacked spoons. Only that there was a snuffling in the hollows at the base of a lovely throat. Only that a hard honey-colored shoulder had a semicircle of teethmarks on it. Only that they held each other close, long after it was over. Only that what they shared that night was not happiness, but hideous grief.Only that once again they broke the Love Laws. That lay down who should be loved. And how. And how much.
happiness.author: Arundhati Roy

happiness.text: Why not surround yourself with things that make you content? After all, there's no place like home.
happiness.author: Jean Oram

happiness.text: Happiness is in contentment, gratitude, and love. It is a lifestyle, not a location.
happiness.author: Ogwo David Emenike

happiness.text: To promote peace, promote understanding. To promote understanding, promote love.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: People who have wellbeing and feel fulfilled, need far less than people who feel unfulfilled, who always seem to need more.' By Rethinking Your Mindset you can create SWIFT sustainable success.
happiness.author: Tony Dovale

happiness.text: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Sometimes we make being happy so difficult. And being thankful such a chore.
happiness.author: Carew Papritz

happiness.text: I can’t control my feelings, but I’m learning to have a say in how much my feelings control me.
happiness.author: Scott Stabile

happiness.text: In the success equation, subtraction comes before multiplication or addition. You must sow before you can reap a harvest.
happiness.author: Mensah Oteh

happiness.text: Dads. Do your faces light up when you first see your child in the morning or when you come home from work? Do you not understand that a child’s entire sense of value can revolve around what they see in your face when you first see them?
happiness.author: Dan Pearce

positive.text: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions  and not our circumstances.
positive.author: Martha Washington

positive.text: The science of psychology has been far more successful on the negative than on the positive side... It has revealed to us much about man's shortcomings, his illnesses, his sins, but little about his potentialities, his virtues, his achievable aspirations, or his psychological health.
positive.author: Abraham Maslow

positive.text: Few things in the world are more powerful than a positive push. A smile. A world of optimism and hope. A 'you can do it' when things are tough.
positive.author: Richard M. DeVos

positive.text: Do not allow your inner doubts to keep you from achieving what you can do.
positive.author: Lolly Daskal

positive.text: Not every problem can be solved. Some are okay simply to avoid. Go around the, go under them, whatever it takes to reach your higher goal. Sometimes you have to fail your way to success.
positive.author: Anna Mitchael

positive.text: The wisdom of all ages and cultures emphasizes the tremendous power our thoughts have over our character and circumstances.
positive.author: Liane Cordes

positive.text: I think that generally music should be a positive thing, I like Bob Marley's attitude: he said that his goal in life was to single handedly fight all the evil in the world with nothing but music, and when he went to a place he didn't go to play, he went to conquer.
positive.author: Jon Fishman

positive.text: That you are misserable and full demons and angry don't make the others like you... It's your problem, as for me I want to continue to be positive!
positive.author: Deyth Banger

positive.text: Never be defeated by roadblocks life throws in your way. Instead, conquer them. You are much stronger than you give yourself credit for.
positive.author: Blaque Diamond

positive.text: Awake my great strength.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: When God gives you an idea, you must act immediately on it.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Dwell on positive thoughts!
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: You have the power to realise your dream. If only you are willing and determined.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Don’t be a victim of circumstances. Choose victory by gracious endurance.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: A positive attitude turns 'I can't & I won't,' into 'I have & I WILL!
positive.author: Mandy Hale

positive.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: I will sacrifice today for tomorrow.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Challenge and adversity are meant to help you know who you are. Storms hit your weakness, but unlock your true strength.
positive.author: Roy T. Bennett

positive.text: Don’t let your mind drown out your intuitive voice, train your subconscious to be positive by using the heart intelligence.
positive.author: Steven Redhead

strength.text: To fall down is to face the weakness of my humanity, test the mettle of my character, and push the limits of my strength. Therefore, falling down will tell me who I am far more clearly than most things I might learn when I’m standing up.
strength.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

strength.text: Because we are the only women who are mothers of men.' Gorgo: when asked by a woman from Attica why Spartan women were the only women in the world who could rule men.
strength.author: Gorgos

strength.text: He lay still, his bloodshot eyes staring blankly before him, and drifted into dreams of his problems, compulsively living out dialogues, summing up emotional scenes with his mother, Dot, and his friends. Repeatedly he chided himself to go to sleep, but it did no good, for he was hungry for these waking visions that depicted his dilemmas, yet he knew that such brooding did not help; in fact he was wasting his waning strength, for into these unreal dramas he was putting the whole of his ardent being. The long hours dragged on.
strength.author: Richard Wright

strength.text: It's her ability as an artist to see possibility where others see a blank page and, by extension, to see victory where others see certain defeat that truly empowers her...
strength.author: Sarah Cross

strength.text: If You Love me..--Your love drove metowards the live volcanowhere I will be burnt and destroyedOn your fake promises I made castles on air Oh! ! ! I was throwingsome pearls in desertwhere oasis has value Pearls have no value just remember I am an oceanyou are only a boat for a boat to explore oceanlove need to be daring, desperate If You love mePlant a seed of truthmake me part of your missingJust If you Love me.........
strength.author: Seema Gupta

strength.text: Endure despite the pain. The key is grace of strength.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Be a craftsman in speech that thou mayest be strong, for the strength of one is the tongue, and speech is mightier than all fighting.
strength.author: Ptah-Hotep

strength.text: ...Whatever happens I'll not be afraid again; for, when you've once pushed through the place of torment to the peace beyond, you know that you can do it again. You know there's a strength somewhere that you can call upon. You've confidence.
strength.author: Elizabeth Goudge

strength.text: Femininity is not just lipstick, stylish hairdos, and trendy clothes. It is the divine adornment of humanity. It finds expression in your qualities of your capacity to love, your spirituality, delicacy, radiance, sensitivity, creativity, charm, graciousness, gentleness, dignity, and quiet strength.
strength.author: James E. Faust

strength.text: I hope we shall crush in its birth the aristocracy of our monied corporations which dare already to challenge our government to a trial by strength, and bid defiance to the laws of our country.
strength.author: Thomas Jefferson

strength.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Luck is for those with nothing else. I wish you strength and courage.
strength.author: Annette Marie

strength.text: But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.
strength.author: Bram Stoker

strength.text: We think we are so strong but it is only when others try to prey on our weaknesses that we realize how frail we truly are.”-Skyla (from Twiceborn).
strength.author: JP Robinson

strength.text: So, preferring death to capture, I accomplished the most astonishing deeds, and which, more then once, showed me that the too great care we take of our bodies is the only obstacle to the sucess of those projects which require rapid decision, and vigorous and determined execution. In reality, when you have once devoted your life to your enterprises, you are no longer the equal of other men, or, rather, other men are no longer your equals, and whosoever has taken this resolution, feels his strength and resources doubled.
strength.author: Alexandre Dumas

strength.text: Man's delight in the Lord is the absolute peak of human triumph. He praises God when full of joy, and when not, he praises God to become full of joy. For to know and to live as though God is worthy of all praise, in all one's circumstances, whether seemingly good or seemingly bad, is the primary definition of joy and the richest triumph for man under God.
strength.author: Criss Jami

strength.text: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
strength.author: Mahatma Gandhi

strength.text: She wore her scarsas her best attire.A stunning dressmade of hellfire.
strength.author: Daniel Saint

strength.text: There were times my heart broke into painful fragments then my soul perseveringly gathered an ocean of strength on my voyage towards renewal.
strength.author: Angelica Hopes

strength.text: You can only find strength, if you dare conquer the situation.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Whenever I am sad and depressed; whenever I cry tears of pain or frustration I ask my little heart, why do I cry. Why does this emotion overtake me time and again. Then a little voice from within say that it’s OK to cry once in a while. If you’ve been hurt, it’s better to cry yourself to calmness, to console yourself instead of retaliating. These tears make me human instead of becoming a hard hearted person. Tears retain the innocent being within me. So tears are my biggest strength, they are my best friends….
strength.author: Latika Teotia

strength.text: God doesn't mock us. He never gives us a goal that we cannot accomplish in His strength. I want to assure you, you can glorify God, you MUST glorify God. But you have to determine deep within your heart that you're going to do it His way.
strength.author: Charles R. Swindoll

strength.text: Great men have great discipline.
strength.author: Habeeb Akande

strength.text: Strength is not defined by the load you bear, it’s defined by the amount you can bend before breaking.
strength.author: Blake Mays

strength.text: And one has to understand that braveness is not the absence of fear but rather the strength to keep on going forward despite the fear.
strength.author: Paulo Coelho

strength.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Yes,” I whisper so the others won’t hear, “but being afraid is good because it means I still have more to lose.
strength.author: Caroline George

strength.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
strength.author: Ally Condie

strength.text: We write to strengthen our soul and the spirit of other souls.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita
